page.title: 11Health
page.content:
In the Milburn area 16 people travel to Appelby to their family doctor 16 to Temple sowerby and 3 travel to Penrith.When treatment in hospital is necessary maternity or old people are referred to Penrith,problem cases Carlisle and anything of a serious nature to Newcastle. 18 people visit a dentist in Appelby 15 go to one in Penrith and 3 travel to Carlisle. In school there are regular visits from dentists, sight and hearing specialists, health visitor,doctor and by request the speech therapist.
The majority of animal owners in the area use a veterinary surgery in Appleby 17 travel to Appleby and 10 use a surgery in Penrith
